name: Salami Rush
description:
Who hasn't felt the pressure of having to work full time to pay the rent at the end of the month? In Salami Rush, Ham has to deal with Mr. Mortadella, who always makes life miserable for him so that he can free up the place he rents for him. To do this, Ham must do his best in his deli to deliver the largest number of orders to his customers, and avoid leaving them unhappy so that they do not sabotage his other orders.

¿Quién no ha sentido la presión de tener que trabajar a full para poder pagar el alquiler a fin de mes? En Salami Rush, Ham tiene que lidiar con Mr. Mortadella, quien siempre le hace la vida imposible para que le libere el local que le alquila. Para ello, Ham deberá dar su mayor esfuerzo en su fiambrería para entregarles la mayor cantidad de pedidos a sus clientes, y evitar dejarlos descontentos para que no le saboteen sus otros pedidos.
